stories.Title: A parkour challenge
stories.Description: Becoming a parkour pro requires a lot of coordination and skills. But can robots do the same? This study pushes robotics' boundaries by demonstrating agility and adaptability during complex maneuvers.
stories.Tweet: A parkour challenge 📦 Becoming a parkour pro requires a lot of coordination and skills. But can robots do the same? This study pushes robotics' boundaries by demonstrating agility and adaptability during complex maneuvers. #robotics https://extreme-parkour.github.io/

stories.Title: Real life WALL-E
stories.Description: When Disney takes on robotics, you know it's going to be special. This charming and expressive robot, crafted through 3D printing, reflects the company's commitment to creativity and innovation.
stories.Tweet: Real life WALL-E 📦 When Disney takes on robotics, you know it's going to be special. This charming and expressive robot, crafted through 3D printing, reflects the company's commitment to creativity and innovation. #robotics https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/emotion-infused-robots-disneys-breakthrough

stories.Title: Watch out Nvidia!
stories.Description: To stay at the forefront of the ever-changing artificial intelligence market, AMD has announced the acquisition of Nod.ai, a startup with an innovative approach to AI software.
stories.Tweet: Watch out Nvidia! 📦 To stay at the forefront of the ever-changing artificial intelligence market, AMD has announced the acquisition of Nod.ai, a startup with an innovative approach to AI software. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/amd-acquires-open-source-ai-software-pioneer-nod-ai-to-fortify-ai-capabilities/

stories.Title: AI's magical approach
stories.Description: As easy as casting spells, a groundbreaking technique enables the swift removal of copyrighted material, like Harry Potter references, from Meta's Llama 2-7B. Did someone say "Obliviate"?
stories.Tweet: AI's magical approach 📦 As easy as casting spells, a groundbreaking technique enables the swift removal of copyrighted material, like Harry Potter references, from Meta's Llama 2-7B. Did someone say "Obliviate"? #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/researchers-turn-to-harry-potter-to-make-ai-forget-about-copyright-material/

stories.Title: Putting the brakes on
stories.Description: As the saying says, what goes up must come down. ChatGPT's mobile app soared with 15.6 million installs and $4.6 million in revenue, but it's now facing the challenge of slow growth.
stories.Tweet: Putting the brakes on 📦 As the saying says, what goes up must come down. ChatGPT's mobile app soared with 15.6 million installs and $4.6 million in revenue, but it's now facing the challenge of slow growth. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/10/09/chatgpts-mobile-app-hit-record-4-58m-in-revenue-last-month-but-growth-is-slowing/

stories.Title: Tough times ahead
stories.Description: Memory chip prices are in a downward spiral, and Samsung isn't immune. Analysts predict a challenging Q3 with forecasts of more than 3 trillion won in losses for their semiconductor division.
stories.Tweet: Tough times ahead 📦 Memory chip prices are in a downward spiral, and Samsung isn't immune. Analysts predict a challenging Q3 with forecasts of more than 3 trillion won in losses for their semiconductor division. #samsung https://www.cnbc.com/2023/10/10/samsung-earnings-preview-q3-2023-chip-losses-weigh-on-profit.html

stories.Title: Lost and now found
stories.Description: Everything is back on track with Euclid, after getting lost briefly in the vast universe. The spacecraft has found its guiding stars and is now ready to investigate dark matter and dark energy.
stories.Tweet: Lost and now found 📦 Everything is back on track with Euclid, after getting lost briefly in the vast universe. The spacecraft has found its guiding stars and is now ready to investigate dark matter and dark energy. #rocketscience https://www.space.com/euclid-telescope-finds-guiding-stars-ready-for-full-science-mode

stories.Title: A leaky situation
stories.Description: The Nauka module on the ISS has experienced a coolant leak from its backup radiator. However, both NASA and Roscosmos have stated that the situation is contained and poses no risk to the crew.
stories.Tweet: A leaky situation 📦 The Nauka module on the ISS has experienced a coolant leak from its backup radiator. However, both NASA and Roscosmos have stated that the situation is contained and poses no risk to the crew. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/russian-iss-module-experiences-coolant-leak/

stories.Title: Psyche as a priority
stories.Description: NASA's Psyche mission takes the spotlight as SpaceX makes way by adjusting its schedule for the launch of 22 Starlink satellites.
stories.Tweet: Psyche as a priority 📦 NASA's Psyche mission takes the spotlight as SpaceX makes way by adjusting its schedule for the launch of 22 Starlink satellites. #spacex https://www.space.com/spacex-starlink-launch-group-6-22

stories.Title: Big news from Isuzu
stories.Description: Isuzu, the renowned Japanese automaker, is making a significant entry into the EV market by offering customers a new eco-friendly choice: an electric pickup truck.
stories.Tweet: Big news from Isuzu 📦 Isuzu, the renowned Japanese automaker, is making a significant entry into the EV market by offering customers a new eco-friendly choice: an electric pickup truck. #electricvehicles https://electrek.co/2023/10/09/new-japanese-electric-truck-coming-not-toyota/

title: More parkour robots, Disney's robotic approach, Samsung's Q3 challenges
description: Robots keep jumping around even in the most demanding environments; new techniques are improving their capabilities and making them better than us at parkour. Continuing with robots, if you see a cute, charming, or extremely expressive one somewhere, Disney is behind it. And here's some bad news for Samsung: analysts are forecasting a gloomy third quarter for the company as the chip market faces challenges.
